description:
Hacknet is a terminal-emulation game developed by Team Fractal Alligator,
and published by Fellow Traveler Games.

hacknet-0.0.4.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AutumnRivers/Archipelago-Hacknet/compare/hacknet-alpha-3-hotfix-2...hacknet-0.0.4

Versions will now use `hacknet-X.X.X` moving forward, for consistency's sake.
hacknet-0.0.4.title: Hacknet 0.0.4

hacknet-alpha-2.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AutumnRivers/Archipelago-Hacknet/compare/hacknet-alpha-1...hacknet-alpha-2

Almost everything except Admin Access as Checks and PointClicker progression has been implemented, at least from the APWorld side.
hacknet-alpha-2.title: Hacknet Alpha 2

hacknet-alpha-2-hotfix1.description:
* Should cut down on generation errors
   * For the meantime, generate with `accessibility` set to `full`, otherwise you're almost guaranteed to get an error
* PointClicker locations actually get added now
* Should now be able to be used on Linux (updated from PowerShell 5 -> PowerShell 7 for the script I use)
hacknet-alpha-2-hotfix1.title: Hacknet Alpha 2 - Hotfix 1

hacknet-alpha-3.description:
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AutumnRivers/Archipelago-Hacknet/compare/hacknet-alpha-2-hotfix1...hacknet-alpha-3

Many, many bug fixes. PointClicker now has actual logic. Implemented executable packs. Still needs a good amount of testing.

If all's good, Admin Access as Checks will be next.
hacknet-alpha-3.title: Hacknet Alpha 3

hacknet-alpha-3-hotfix-1.description:
* Fixed most generation errors (finally)
* Renamed `checks_and_items` value for `shuffle_ptc` to `block_upgrades`
* Change how rules are set, internally

This update is purely a hotfix to the APWorld and doesn't require an update to the client mod.
hacknet-alpha-3-hotfix-1.title: Hacknet Alpha 3 - Hotfix 1

hacknet-alpha-3-hotfix-2.description:
* This hotfix only updates the APWorld, no changes to the YAML
* Fixed PointClicker logic errors
hacknet-alpha-3-hotfix-2.title: Hacknet Alpha 3 - Hotfix 2
